record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="model" and term="model table" and format.name="model" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: model
record.format.name: model

brief.brief: Contains descriptions of and templates for equipment you want to track.

You can use model records to track the model type identified by a unique name (often a number), the manufacturer, and a description of the model, and standard prices and information pertaining to typical contracts.
Typically, support technicians use model records to quickly find and request equipment. System administrators typically create and update model records.

detail.detail: This table is for reference purposes only.
